data.message: Hey Marshall if you need some good songs for a future project, a probable album for 2016 can count on me I'm half without writing a lot of songs, because of what I'm getting ready to take a major step in music but still keep escevendo after rap God, there may be new ideas, I'm watching in the world to be able to do something insane and crazy that neither that time, I would rather care about the qu others would think but thank God I do not care anymore, it's time to point the finger to society and shove it up your ass this society
